languages.text: "...лучшая награда". {n}Неловко заканчивает свою речь ваш слуга. Бросив на вас протрезвевший взгляд, он поспешно кланяется и торопится слиться с тенями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "...лучшая награда". {n}Неловко заканчивает свою речь ваш слуга. Бросив на вас протрезвевший взгляд, он поспешно кланяется и торопится слиться с тенями.{/n}

languages.text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}
languages.original_text: "...лучшая награда". {n}Неловко заканчивает свою речь ваш слуга. Бросив на вас протрезвевший взгляд, он поспешно кланяется и торопится слиться с тенями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, quickly bows, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}

"—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}

languages.text: "- die größte Belohnung"{n}, endet er unbeholfen. Er blickt dich mit einem nüchterneren Blick in den Augen an, verneigt sich schnell und eilt fort in die Schatten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "- die größte Belohnung"{n}, endet er unbeholfen. Er blickt dich mit einem nüchterneren Blick in den Augen an, verneigt sich schnell und eilt fort in die Schatten.{/n}

languages.text: «... la mejor recompensa posible», {n}concluye, incómodo. Te mira de reojo, más sereno, hace una breve reverencia y se apresura a ocultarse en las sombras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «... la mejor recompensa posible», {n}concluye, incómodo. Te mira de reojo, más sereno, hace una breve reverencia y se apresura a ocultarse en las sombras.{/n}

languages.text: 「最高の報酬でございます」{n}彼はぎこちなく告げ終える。先ほどよりも冷静な目であなたを一瞥し、一礼すると物陰へと急ぐ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「最高の報酬でございます」{n}彼はぎこちなく告げ終える。先ほどよりも冷静な目であなたを一瞥し、一礼すると物陰へと急ぐ。{/n}

languages.text: “——最大的嘉奖。”{n}他笨拙地说完了话，之后以更加庄重的眼神看了你一眼，迅速鞠了一躬，便匆匆消失在阴影之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “——最大的嘉奖。”{n}他笨拙地说完了话，之后以更加庄重的眼神看了你一眼，迅速鞠了一躬，便匆匆消失在阴影之中。{/n}

languages.text: « ... la plus belle des récompenses, » {n}finit-il avec un air gêné. Il vous lance un regard plus sobre puis s'incline brièvement avant de disparaître dans les ombres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « ... la plus belle des récompenses, » {n}finit-il avec un air gêné. Il vous lance un regard plus sobre puis s'incline brièvement avant de disparaître dans les ombres.{/n}

languages.text: "...Alınabilecek en yüce ödüldür." {n}Cümlesini tuhaf bir şekilde bitiriyor. Gözlerinde daha aklı başına gelmiş bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor. Ardından önünde alelacele eğilip gölgelere doğru koşarak uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "—the greatest reward," {n}he finishes awkwardly. He glances at you with a more sober look in his eyes, bows quickly, and hurries off into the shadows.{/n}
